name: Deep In Debt
description:
It is your final year at EIA the workload is piling up, you feel your emotions becoming more unstable.

Eventually you crumble under the pressure and you must fight off your negative emotions that you've conjured in your mind.

Overcome your own mind.

Made by:

Designers: Matthew Lynch and Andre'a Paleologos

Programmers:  Marshall Scholz and James Baker

Artists: Joseph Stevenson and James Flynn

Made with the theme of Wellbeing.

Used NavMeshPlus - https://github.com/h8man/NavMeshPlus
